Title: Oraalppokkam
Writer: Sanal Kumar Sasidharan (screenplay), Sanal Kumar Sasidharan (scripted by), Sanal Kumar Sasidharan (story)
Actors: Prakash Bare, Meena Kandasamy, Chala Chari, Bikramjit Gupta
Plot: Mahendran and Maya split up after 5 years of living together. After a long time Maya calls him from a Himalayan valley Kedar which is devastated in a cloudburst soon. Mahendran starts an aimless journey which turns out to be a search.
